title: Extensive Options
description: Adjust every aspect of Octa-Cram to meet your network management needs
aiDescription: Enable advanced AI features to analyze and automatically optimize your network.
notificationDescription: Control all types of system notifications
networkDescription: Control every detail of network connection, from DNS to multi-network binding.
securityDescription: Adjust protection and privacy levels for your network and connected devices.
systemDescription: Adjust system resource, power, and performance settings.

notifications.title: Notification Settings
notifications.description: Control which types of notifications you want to receive
notifications.systemDesc: Notifications about system status and important events
notifications.securityDesc: Urgent alerts about potential security threats
notifications.updatesDesc: Notifications about system updates and new features
notifications.aiAssistantDesc: Messages and suggestions from the AI assistant
notifications.networkAlertsDesc: Alerts about network and connection issues
notifications.performanceDesc: Alerts about system performance and improvements
